facts.fact: Bauspar combines saving + loan: First you save 30-50% of target amount, then get a guaranteed low-interest loan (currently ~2.5-3%) for the rest.
Germany's most popular funds savings plan—automatically invests small monthly amounts (€25+) into diversified global equities.
Private liability insurance covers damages you cause to others—mandatory in Germany, often overlooked by young professionals.
Construction financing with up to 100% loan-to-value, terms up to 35 years, often combined with Schwäbisch Hall Bauspar for optimal rates.
Unsecured consumer loan up to €75k, decision in minutes, fixed rates—useful for liquidity needs or debt consolidation.
facts.compliance_note: Check suitability—ensure client can service debt
